mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gk_examination_paper ( years, sort, m_beikaochongci_type_id, m_beikaochongci_type, subjectId, paperName, frontCover, subContent, price, isAccept, resources, resourcesExt, resourcesFilesize, downloadsAutomatic, downloadsManual, createDate, status, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{years}, #{sort}, #{mbeikaochongciTypeId}, #{mbeikaochongciType}, #{subjectId}, #{paperName}, #{frontCover}, #{subContent}, #{price}, #{isAccept}, #{resources}, #{resourcesExt}, #{resourcesFilesize}, #{downloadsAutomatic}, #{downloadsManual}, #{createDate}, #{status}, #{creator}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:

years = #{years},
sort = #{sort},
m_beikaochongci_type_id = #{mbeikaochongciTypeId},
m_beikaochongci_type = #{mbeikaochongciType},

subContent = #{subContent},
price = #{price},

resources = #{resources},
resourcesExt = #{resourcesExt},
resourcesFilesize = #{resourcesFilesize},

downloadsManual = #{downloadsManual},
createDate = #{createDate},
status = #{status},
creator = #{creator},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
WHERE id = #{id}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gk_examination_paper ( years, sort, m_beikaochongci_type_id, m_beikaochongci_type, subjectId, paperName, frontCover, subContent, price, isAccept, resources, resourcesExt, resourcesFilesize, downloadsAutomatic, downloadsManual, createDate, status, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{map.years}, #{map.sort}, #{map.mbeikaochongciTypeId}, #{map.mbeikaochongciType}, #{map.subjectId}, #{map.paperName}, #{map.frontCover}, #{map.subContent}, #{map.price}, #{map.isAccept}, #{map.resources}, #{map.resourcesExt}, #{map.resourcesFilesize}, #{map.downloadsAutomatic}, #{map.downloadsManual}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gk_examination_paper
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND years like CONCAT('%', #{years} , '%')
AND sort like CONCAT('%', #{sort} , '%')
AND m_beikaochongci_type_id like CONCAT('%', #{mbeikaochongciTypeId} , '%')
AND m_beikaochongci_type like CONCAT('%', #{mbeikaochongciType} , '%')
AND subjectId like CONCAT('%', #{subjectId} , '%')
AND paperName like CONCAT('%', #{paperName} , '%')
AND frontCover like CONCAT('%', #{frontCover} , '%')
AND subContent like CONCAT('%', #{subContent} , '%')
AND price like CONCAT('%', #{price} , '%')
AND isAccept like CONCAT('%', #{isAccept} , '%')
AND resources like CONCAT('%', #{resources} , '%')
AND resourcesExt like CONCAT('%', #{resourcesExt} , '%')
AND resourcesFilesize like CONCAT('%', #{resourcesFilesize} , '%')
AND downloadsAutomatic like CONCAT('%', #{downloadsAutomatic} , '%')
AND downloadsManual like CONCAT('%', #{downloadsManual} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
